SPECIAL EDUCATION AND CHILD FIND INFORMATION

div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

strong.em: Listed below are websites that provide reliable and up to date information regarding the COVID-19 virus. Make sure and check back often as we will update this as necessary

p.a: Talking to your child about COVID-19
CDC-Talking to your child about COVID-19

p.em: Below you will find instructional resources that have been vetted by our instructional team. We suggest spending 30-45 minutes daily for math and reading. If you need packets printed for you please email resources@jisdtx.us
If your child(ren) need help logging into to the resources listed below please email resources@jisdtx.us
